dialogues.speaker: Charlie
dialogues.text: Hi! I’m Charlie, I’ve been running this inn for a few years now, and I’m excited to meet you! It’s been pretty slow since the last traveler came through, but if you’re willing to stay with me awhile, maybe we’ll be able get back on track!

dialogues.speaker: Nancy
dialogues.text: Hello there, I am Nancy, and I am currently in the neighborhood. I was hoping you might have a room to spare, as I have business to attend to.

dialogues.speaker: Charlie
dialogues.text: Well, I can’t really promise anything, you understand, but I do have a spare room, if you’re interested.

dialogues.speaker: Nancy
dialogues.text: Excellent, I am most interested in staying with you. Tell me more about your inn!

dialogues.speaker: Charlie
dialogues.text: It’s called the “Drunken Sailor”, and it’s a small inn that’s been here for generations. There’s only me running it right now, but I think I’ll be able to keep you pretty busy, so you shouldn’t have too much free time.

dialogues.speaker: Nancy
dialogues.text: Ah, I think I’ll like it here.
